Bits Lab     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Bits Lab      Bits Lab   Main Menu    Home    Sample Projects           Deterministic Multithreading    Delegation for Efficient Multi-Threading    Congestion control for RDMA    Tail Latency in Datacenters    Cache-efficient index access for large in-memory datasets    Vehicle Counting    Cloudsweeper         Publications    Join BITS Lab    People    Contact     Eyebrow menu    Department of Computer Science    College of Engineering    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                         Sample Projects      View Menu            We always have a large number of exciting projects ongoing, but here is a small sample of projects to give you an idea of the range of projects we undertake.      projects        Deterministic Multithreading  Consequence: Achieves deterministic execution via store buffering and strict  ordering of synchronization operations          Delegation for Efficient Multi-Threading  In this NSF-funded project, we study delegation as an alternative to synchronized access to shared memory          Congestion control for RDMA  Addresses the challenge of achieving extreme low latency in datacenter networks for Online Big Data (OLBD) applications          Tail Latency in Datacenters  Address the shortcomings that cause long latency tails in the datacenter network          Cache-efficient index access for large datasets  Improving index access in data-intensive applications          Cloudsweeper  We provide tools to help users understand and control their risks online              Sample Projects           Deterministic Multithreading    Delegation for Efficient Multi-Threading    Congestion control for RDMA    Tail Latency in Datacenters    Cache-efficient index access for large in-memory datasets    Vehicle Counting    Cloudsweeper
